survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Urban Bike Sharing Programs Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction levels with urban bike sharing programs, focusing on ease of use, availability, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use urban bike sharing programs in a typical month?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.
